Title: Console Highlighter
Description: Hightlights Microsoft Windows Command prompt (cmd.exe) by outputting ANSI VT100 Control sequences to color the output. These sequences are not handled by cmd.exe, so there is a ANSI VT100 Colorizer project also included.
